This film is about a young man who accidentally hacks into a military supercomputer and inadvertently starts a global war. Another suggestion could be "Find Me Guilty" (2006), a biographical drama about a low-level gangster who defies social convention to become an ambassador for the sport of competitive beard growing. Peter Dinklage and Vin Diesel star in this inspiring film that might resonate with your interest in baseball due to its strong character development.
